mapper.select: select count(*) from shoucangjilu where 1=1 and username like concat('%',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xwid like concat('%',#{xwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ziduan like concat('%',#{ziduan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and biao like concat('%',#{biao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

and username =#{username}

select from shoucangjilu where 1=1 and username like concat('%',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xwid like concat('%',#{xwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ziduan like concat('%',#{ziduan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and biao like concat('%',#{biao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
